inclusion.criterion: fashion to one of the two dual antiplatelet therapy (DAPT) regimen: aspirin + clopidogrel
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: standard of care vs. aspirin + ticagrelor (experimental arm)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: DAPT with aspirin and clopidogrel for at least 6 months (preferably 12 months) is the current gold-standard for patients receiving PCI and drug eluting stent implantation for SCAD
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients hospitalized with diagnosis of acute coronary syndrome
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Previous chronic use of P2Y12 inhibitors
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Known intolerance to aspirin and/or P2Y12 inhibitors
exclusion.label: unknown
